Services

类 PlayerSessions

  • java.lang.Object
    • Services.PlayerSessions

  • public class PlayerSessions
extends java.lang.Object
    PlayerSessions is a class where the server keeps the conversation context with the clients.

    Instantiate this class is useless,use methods to access data.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PlayerSessions() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addNewContext(java.lang.Integer user_id, javax.servlet.AsyncContext asyncContext)
      Add new context to the mapping.Should always call after client connection
      void delContext(java.lang.Integer user_id)
      Remove expired context from the mapping.
      javax.servlet.AsyncContext getContext(java.lang.Integer user_id)
      Get AsyncContext from the mapping.
      void refresh(java.lang.Integer user_id, javax.servlet.AsyncContext asyncContext)
      Replace an expire context in the mapping.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PlayerSessions

        public PlayerSessions()

    • 方法详细资料

      • addNewContext

        public void addNewContext(java.lang.Integer user_id,
                          javax.servlet.AsyncContext asyncContext)
                   throws MultipleContextException
        Add new context to the mapping.Should always call after client connection
        参数:
        user_id - The id of the client.
        asyncContext - The asynchronous context of the connection.
        抛出:
        MultipleContextException - When key conflicts.

      • delContext

        public void delContext(java.lang.Integer user_id)
                throws NoCorrespondingContextException
        Remove expired context from the mapping.
        参数:
        user_id - The user id of the expired connection.
        抛出:
        NoCorrespondingContextException

      • refresh

        public void refresh(java.lang.Integer user_id,
                    javax.servlet.AsyncContext asyncContext)
             throws NoCorrespondingContextException,
                    MultipleContextException
        Replace an expire context in the mapping.
        参数:
        user_id - The user id of connection to be refreshed.
        asyncContext - The latest version of context.
        抛出:
        NoCorrespondingContextException - Will be thrown When there's no context for the user_id.
        MultipleContextException - When key conflicts.

      • getContext

        public javax.servlet.AsyncContext getContext(java.lang.Integer user_id)
                                      throws NoCorrespondingContextException
        Get AsyncContext from the mapping.
        参数:
        user_id - The id of user.
        返回:
        The AsyncContext of given user_id.
        抛出:
        NoCorrespondingContextException
